vnfs.description: OpenWRT VNFD with parameterized VDU name

attributes.heat_template:
heat_template_version: 2013-05-23
description: 'OpenWRT with services

  '
parameters:
  vdu-name:
    type: string
    description: Vdu name
    default: test-vdu
resources:
  CP1:
    type: OS::Neutron::Port
    properties:
      network: net_mgmt
      port_security_enabled: false
  CP2:
    type: OS::Neutron::Port
    properties:
      network: net0
      port_security_enabled: false
  CP3:
    type: OS::Neutron::Port
    properties:
      network: net1
      port_security_enabled: false
  VDU1:
    type: OS::Nova::Server
    properties:
      config_drive: false
      flavor: {get_resource: VDU1_flavor}
      image: OpenWRT
      name:
        get_param: vdu-name
      networks:
      - port:
          get_resource: CP1
      - port:
          get_resource: CP2
      - port:
          get_resource: CP3
      user_data_format: SOFTWARE_CONFIG
  VDU1_flavor:
    properties: {disk: 1, ram: 512, vcpus: 1}
    type: OS::Nova::Flavor
outputs:
  mgmt_ip-VDU1:
    value:
      get_attr: [CP1, fixed_ips, 0, ip_address]

vnfs.name: OpenWRT
